articles.title: EA cancels Anthem’s big revamp but will keep the game running - The Verge
articles.description: Following a meeting with EA, BioWare has announced that post-launch support for Anthem will not continue. The game was released nearly two years ago and was met with mediocre reviews due to repetitive gameplay and a lack of content.
